baseRule.text: 若比丘尼以香塗身。波逸提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 153

fullParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī gandhavaṇṇakena nahāyeyya, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 88

translations.text: Welche Nonne aber mit Duft und Farbe badet, muß dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni (not being ill) bathe with perfumes and scents, it is to be confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang (tidak sedang sakit) mandi dengan parfum dan wangi-wangian, itu harus di akui.

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，以香塗摩身者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 150

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻尼以香塗身者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 166

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。不病使比丘尼揩摩洗浴者波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 126

partialParallels.text: 若比丘尼。以塗香胡麻滓屑揩身。波夜提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 164

partialParallels.text: 若復苾芻尼以胡麻滓揩身者。波逸底迦。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 167

partialParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī vāsitakena piññākena nahāyeyya, pācittiyaṁ.
partialParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 89

translations.text: Welche Nonne aber mit parfümiertem Sesam-Mus badet, muß dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni (not being ill) bathe with scented sesame powder, it is to be confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang (tidak sedang sakit) mandi dengan bedak wijen wangi, itu harus di akui.

partialParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，以胡麻滓塗摩身者，波逸提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 151

partialParallels.text: 若比丘尼無病。以澤枯揩身。波逸提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 154

partialParallels.text: 若復苾芻尼使他以水揩身者。波逸底迦。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 168
